DataSource.Query:
SELECT finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id AS tran_id, finance.cost_centers.cost_center_code, inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, SUM(inventory.checkouts.taxable_total + inventory.checkouts.nontaxable_total) AS amount, inventory.checkouts.taxable_total, inventory.checkouts.nontaxable_total, inventory.checkouts.discount, inventory.checkouts.tax, inventory.checkouts.taxable_total + inventory.checkouts.nontaxable_total - inventory.checkouts.discount + inventory.checkouts.tax AS total
FROM purchase.purchases INNER JOIN inventory.checkouts ON inventory.checkouts.checkout_id = purchase.purchases.checkout_id INNER JOIN inventory.suppliers ON inventory.suppliers.supplier_id = purchase.purchases.supplier_id INNER JOIN finance.transaction_master ON finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id = inventory.checkouts.transaction_master_id LEFT JOIN finance.cost_centers ON finance.cost_centers.cost_center_id = finance.transaction_master.cost_center_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND finance.transaction_master.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND finance.transaction_master.office_id = @OfficeId AND (COALESCE(@CostCenterId, 0) = 0 OR finance.cost_centers.cost_center_id = @CostCenterId) AND (COALESCE(@UserId, 0) = 0 OR finance.transaction_master.user_id = @UserId) GROUP BY finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id, finance.cost_centers.cost_center_code, inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, inventory.checkouts.taxable_total, inventory.checkouts.nontaxable_total, inventory.checkouts.discount, inventory.checkouts.tax;
